title: Points Denied in Error
description: Similar to $points awarded in error:points-awarded-in-error$, $points denied in error:points-denied-in-error$ are points that have been legally earned by a $Jammer:jammer$ but have not been added to the Official Score due to delay, an error by an Official, or as the result of a technology malfunction.
regExp: /([\s\,\.\!\-\(\)\'\"\“\”\’]|^)(Points Denied in Error|point denied in error|points denied-in-error|point denied-in-error)([\s\,\.\!\-\(\)\'\"\“\”\’]|$)/gi
